metadata.title: CVE-2010-4208 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.5.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla, Moodle, andother products, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors related to uploader/assets/uploader.swf.

criterions.comment: loggerhead package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
